abstract: On Tuesday, officials at the Arthur M. Sackler Gallery and the Freer Gallery of Art in Washington announced that Dame Jillian Sackler had donated $5 million to establish an endowment to fund the director's post and programs at the galleries
lead_paragraph: Many philanthropists donate money to found an institution and then leave it up to officials to worry about the operating costs. Not Dame Jillian Sackler. On Tuesday, officials at the Arthur M. Sackler Gallery and the Freer Gallery of Art in Washington announced that Ms. Sackler had donated $5 million to establish an endowment to fund the director's post and programs at the galleries that are named, in part, after her husband.

headline.main: Sackler's Widow Gives Smithsonian Galleries $5 Million Endowment
